metadata.title: CVE-2020-24369 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
ldebug.c in Lua 5.4.0 attempts to access debug information via the linehook of a stripped function, leading to a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24369` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.1-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
